data.message: WARNING: Rumor on the streets is The Rokkaku ⭕️ Group is getting ready for the next ROUND 🥊 of their 🌎 GLOBAL ⛓ TAKEOVER. Stay SMART! 🎧🧠🐑 • BOMB 💣 RUSH 💥 CYBERFUNK 🤖: Battle rival crews and dispatch militarized police to conquer the five boroughs of New Amsterdam! NOW AVAILABLE!!! 🎧😝🙌 • ⚠️ NOTICE: Things are starting to heat 🔥 up everywhere you 👀📺📰 look! Something is happening on the world 🚧⛓🌎 streets... and word 🐑💬 has it Rokkaku ⭕️ is behind 😈 it all... • MIND 🐑 KONTROL: Rokkaku is breaking down society and killing 🧠🧟‍♂️ brain cells. Bread and circus 🎪 sideshows 🃏 everywhere. Don't be conditioned into playin a 🤡 FOOL! • RUMORS: Rumors of a new Jet Set Radio are spreading... but truth is those aren't rumors at all. It's happening, yo. STAY 📻🎶 TUNED! • WARNING: The Rokkaku ⭕️ Group has been secretly creating the 🔥 problems needed in order to radically 🚧 change Tokyo-to... and the ⛓🌎 world... • WATER: Remember to STAY HYDRATED 💦 • NOTICE: The FUTURE is NEAR... it's never been more important to spread the WORD 🎧🗣💬📻🎶 • TIP: You can change radio STATIONS by pressing the graffiti soul, track name or the top right RADIO icon. • REMINDER: Brush yo teeth! 😁 • TIP: You can watch JSRLTV 📺 and open the CHAT 💬 at the same time. Hide the chat background using the light switch icon. • TWITTER: Be sure to follow @jetsetradiolive on Twitter! • SPECIAL THANKS: Thanks to ALL of you who make this radio possible!!! •
